Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See `IERC20.balanceOf`."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"See `IERC20.totalSupply`."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"See `IERC20.transfer`.
